description: VMware vSphere Dashboard using the new Telegraf plugin

targets.query: SELECT last("totalCapacity_average") * (last("usage_average")) / 100 * 1024 FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.label: vCenter Server
list.name: vcenter
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=vcenter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=clustername WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/
list.label: Cluster
list.name: clustername
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=clustername WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=esxhostname WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/
list.label: ESXi Server
list.name: esxi
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_host_cpu WITH KEY=esxhostname WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM vsphere_datastore_disk WITH KEY=source WHERE "vcenter" =~ /$vcenter/
